roleset.name: fit neatly/tightly
roleset.note: DOVETAIL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dovetail' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from dovetail.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Mr. Pertschuk adds that the new commercial dovetails perfectly with major aspects of Philip Morris's political strategy.
example.arg: with major aspects of Philip Morris's political strategy
